name: Love Exchange
description: To drown in love is to deny it's embrace, for like an ocean it's endless beauty cannot be appreciated blind.
effect: Devotees of the Endless Expanse of Love may call upon 'Love Exchange' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to swap stat changes with another character Both you and the target must have at least one stat change. At Luminary, also choose one stat for one character to increase or decrease by 1. At High Priest(ess), gain another use.
